Posted By: Doug
Hey I'm Doug and I stumbled across these T206 cards and wanted to see if anyone was interested in purchasing them. Send me an email and let me know your offer. kilaartist@aol.com Thanks for looking.

Graham, St. Louis Amer. w. Piedmont 350 Fact. 25, 2nd Dist. VA - $25
Burch, Brooklyn w. Sweet Corporal 350-460 Fact. 42 4th Dist. NC -$25
Arellanes, Boston Amer. w. Polar Bear Fact. 6 1st Dist. O - $30
McIntyre, Detroit w. Sweet Corporal 350 Fact. 30 2nd Dist. NY -$20
Knight, N.Y. Amer. w. Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 2nd Dist. VA - $25
Moran, Providence w. Cycle 350 Fact. 25 2nd Dist. VA -$50

If you need additional photos of the cards let me know.
